p: Different regions have different TR and TS ( Fig. 4). Areas with the highest TR are located in Northwest China where amphibian species richness is lower. Areas with high TS are located in Central and Southern China and these areas were inconsistent with areas of high TR. According to our combining indicator (with TR > 50% and TS > 20) (one-half of its maximum value as the criterion), climate strongly influenced amphibian distributions in five regions: the Qinling Mountains, Wuyi Mountains, Dabie Mountains, Sichuan Basin and surrounding areas, and western Guizhou province ( Fig. 4).
